entry.title: Wednesday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
